entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndicatorTemplate not showing indicator 'pills' when CarouselView is in header of a CollectionView - and the items are added dynamically to the CarouselView #14898
  • Remove all uses of `ContainerView` #14895
    Backlog
  • Safe area insets CSS env not working on Android #14894
  • [iOS] On ScrollToAsync performed blank space appearing at bottom. #14891
    Backlog
  • ".NET MAUI" is not Listed as Project Template on Visual Studio 2022 Community #14890
  • Using font files does not work #14871
  • DisplayAlert not working on CommunityToolkit.Maui Popup #14870
  • Gestures are not Completed or Canceled #14869
    .NET 8

Closed

  • Use of Preferences class in .Net MAUI class library causes build failure with NU1202 error #14733
  • Dynamic Resources Doesn't Work with AppThemeBinding on ResourceDictionaries #14855
  • "What's the team currently working on?" is pointing to an empty page #14873
  • CascadeInputTransparent = false not work #10040
    Backlog
  • [Shell] GoToAsync("..") from modal page does nothing #14858
  • InputTransparent property does not work on Android #9069
    .NET 8 Planning
  • TapGestureRecognizer does not work in label's span #8004
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI Windows Production Sample #14893
  • Title bar still not behaving correctly... #7123
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Title bar lags behind when resizing #13479
    .NET 8
  • On Windows (WinUI) Minimize, Normal, Maximize buttons behave strangely #7751
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ContentView inside Grid causes "Element not found" exception under certain conditions #6577
    Backlog
  • Maui build system ignores VS BuildAction=None and builds anyway #6642
    Backlog
  • [iOS] After lower positioned text entry item selected and scrolled, you can't scroll back to it. #14043
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move main to use macOS Ventura machines #14901
  • [core] use StringComparer for Dictionary/HashSet #14900
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Update AndroidX #14892
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.5.0 to 1.5.0.1 #14888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.11 to 1.0.0.12 #14887
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1.1 #14886
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14885
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1 to 1.6.1.1 #14884
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14883
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14882
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.16 to 1.0.0.17 #14881
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14880
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.2 to 1.3.1.3 #14879
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0 to 1.3.0.1 #14878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0 to 1.8.0.1 #14877
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.11 to 1.1.0.12 #14876
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.8.0 to 1.8.0.1 #14875
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Stable branding 8.0.0-preview.4 #14896
  • [controls] improve performance of {Binding} #14830
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Removing skip attribute from SearchBarHandlerTests.CancelButtonColorInitializeCorrectly on Windows #14852
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Merge latest main to net8 #14826
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Backport some net8.0 changes to main #14843
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14841
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
